alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Coshocton; Guernsey; Muskingum; Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 9:20AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A LINE OF GUSTY SHOWERS WILL AFFECT NORTHWESTERN GUERNSEY...COSHOCTON... MUSKINGUM...NORTHWESTERN CARROLL AND TUSCARAWAS COUNTIES... At 918 AM EST, radar indicated gusty showers were located along a cold front extending from near Loudonville to Groveport. Movement was east at 45 mph. Wind gusts up to 50 mph are possible with these showers. These gusts will last for less than an hour, and will be follwed by gusts of 25 to 35 MPH into the afternoon. Locations impacted include... Zanesville, New Philadelphia, Dover, Coshocton, Newcomerstown, Strasburg, New Concord, West Lafayette, Sugarcreek, South Zanesville, North Zanesville, and Dresden. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Ohio near mile marker 143, and between mile markers 145 and 168. Interstate 77 in Ohio between mile markers 61 and 95. If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Use extra caution if traveling, especially in high-profile vehicles.
